Description.en: All players must immediately play a \stn{} card.
All players holding at least one \btr{} must raise their hands. You may swap any held \stn{} of yours for a \btr{} of their choice.
All players must immediately reveal their \textbf{Cacophony} cards. If there are 3 or fewer other \textbf{Cacophony} cards revealed, gain that many \pnts{}. Otherwise, discard all your \act{} cards.
All other players discard 2 \act{} cards. If \textbf{Joy} is in play, double this effect.
You may play 2 \act{} cards immediately. If \textbf{Misery} has been played this round, you may play 3 \act{} cards immediately instead.
Cancel the effects of that \act{}.

Instant.en: At any point while a player is playing an \act{}.

Description.en: For the next 30 seconds, you may look at the \act{} draw deck, and order it or shuffle it in any way you wish before putting it back.
All players holding at least one \brg{} must raise their hands. You may swap any held \stn{} of yours with a \brg{} of their choice.
You may swap two of your played \stn{} cards.
Choose any player who must reveal their held \stn{} cards to everyone, then give that player this \textbf{Burning Truth} card instead of discarding it.
Negate that effect. The player must also discard all their \act{} cards.

Instant.en: If a player tries to take or swap any of your held cards.

Description.en: All other players must discard \act{} cards until they have one fewer than you.
You may look at the played \stn{} cards of any one other player.
While this card is in effect, no \act{} cards may be drawn.
Remove \textbf{Famine} from play. Draw as many \act{} cards as there are players, then give each player one card of your choosing.
Remove all persistent \act{} cards from play.
You may turn any of your own played \stn{} cards face-up.
No effect. While you hold this card, you may not play any other \act{} cards.

If another player has \textbf{Love}, they may reveal it and discard it, and you both gain 2 \pnts{}. Only the first player to reveal will gain \pnts{}. If no player reveals \textbf{Love}, you lose 2 \pnts{}.
All players must give you one of their \act{} cards, of their choosing.
All players, including yourself, must reveal one of their played \stn{} cards and then return it to their hand.
You may pick the card up and play it yourself immediately afterwards.

Instant.en: If an \act{} allows a player to take cards from your hand

Description.en: Flip their \stn{} over and reveal it. If it is \brg{}, gain 1 \pnt{}. If it is \btr{}, take 2 \pnts{} from the player.

Instant.en: When a player plays a \stn{} against you

Description.en: You may replay this \act{} against a different player afterwards.

Instant.en: When you play an \act{} that targets another player

Description.en: Deflect the effect of this \act{} to the player to your left.
Gain 1 \pnt{}. All members of the \textbf{Queer Throatslitting Collective}, except yourself, must reveal themselves.
Gain 1 \pnt{}. All members of the \textbf{League of Inordinate Reprobates}, except yourself, must reveal themselves.
Gain 1 \pnt{}. All members of the \textbf{Church of the Undying Rose}, except yourself, must reveal themselves.
Gain 1 \pnt{}. All members of the \textbf{Vengeful Sacrificium}, except yourself, must reveal themselves.
Gain 1 \pnt{}. All members of \textbf{Ye Brothers Merry}, except yourself, must reveal themselves.
You may accuse another player of being a member of any group. If you are correct, they must reveal themselves and give you 2 \pnts{}.
Take 2 \pnts{} from that player.

Instant.en: When a player is forced to reveal a card or their alliance

Description.en: Take that \act{} for yourself, and draw another \act{}.
While this card is in effect, any effect that allows or forces a player to reveal a card is negated.
Remove \textbf{Loadshedding} from play. The players with the most \act{} cards lose 2 \pnts{}.
Reveal one of your alliances. Other players in this alliance may also reveal themselves. Each of you receives 1 \pnt{} per revealed player.
Choose a player, who must reveal their alliance. All other members of this alliance must reveal themselves and lose 1 \pnt{}.
You must reveal 4 of your held \act{} cards.

Instant.en: If this card gets passed to you by another player, you \textbf{must} play it

Description.en: Look at their \act{} cards and take any two.

Instant.en: If another player says the word 'love'
